author: Brendan Pierson
title: New York sues Trump administration over coronavirus sick leave rules
description: New York's attorney general on Tuesday sued the Trump administration over a federal rule that she says illegally limits paid sick leave for workers affected by the coronavirus.
content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - New York’s attorney general on Tuesday sued the Trump administration over a federal rule that she says illegally limits paid sick leave for workers affected by the coronavirus. 
Attorney General Letitia James said in a lawsuit filed in M… [+1299 chars]
